name: Madness, Gaslighting & Toxins
author: FakeTier
bootlegger: The Chaos Hatter rule is in-play.

name: Hope - π
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any question & learn some answers (only 1 is correct).
flavor: Recover HP by 8 and gain 4 Barrier

otherNightReminder: If a Trauma died, they have learnt their character and a new Trauma has been made. If you haven't done this yet, do so now. :reminder:
name: Trauma - π
ability: When you die, learn your character then a Townsfolk becomes a Trauma, thinks they are a Townsfolk & learns false info.
flavor: Take 4 damage. Disappears from deck when used in Battle. Cannot be lost or dissolved

jinxes.reason: Players turned into Trauma through its ability learn only true info if the Vortox is alive, sober and healthy.

name: Showtime - π
ability: If you die & 5 or more non-Travellers live, choose an alive player: if they are not executed tomorrow, your team loses.
flavor: Gain 2 Automana status & reduce cooldown of Attack cards by 2

jinxes.reason: If the Showtime chooses the same player as the Hagumoth, the Showtime is poisoned.

firstNightReminder: The Hagumoth might choose a player. :reminder: Put the Hagumoth to sleep. Wake the target. Show the *THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU* token then the Hagumoth token.
otherNightReminder: The Hagumoth might choose a player. :reminder: Put the Hagumoth to sleep. Wake the target. Show the *THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU* token then the Hagumoth token.
name: Hagumoth - π
ability: Each night, you may choose a player: they learn this & if they are executed tomorrow, their team loses.
flavor: Through the path of Umalaaq, I stand upon thy grave. Through the will of the One Beyond, I break thy spirit. Through the ends of Heaven and Hell, I cut thy heart.

jinxes.reason: If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Hagumoth ability in addition to their own and learns this.
The Vizier wakes with the Hagumoth, learns who they choose and cannot choose to immediately execute that player tomorrow.

otherNightReminder: The Zhobazhbu chooses a player. :reminder:. If that player is a Minion, reverse Townsfolk info. :reminder: :reminder:
name: Zhobazhbu - π
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & reverse Townsfolk info. [-1 Outsider]
flavor: Bathe within the flames, such that they purify thee of thy sin of weakness and frailty. Through atonement for thy mortality thou shalt be embraced by The One Beyond.

jinxes.reason: If the Demon kills the Banshee, players still learn that they have died.

otherNightReminder: The Sabnock chooses a player. :reminder: If that player is an Outsider, poison a neighboring Townsfolk. :reminder: :reminder:
name: Sabnock - π
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Outsiders you kill poison the closest Townsfolk neighbor to you. [+1 Outsider]

jinxes.reason: Traumas created by its own ability do not register as Outsiders to the Sabnock.

name: Madeline - π
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk equal to the night's number (maximum of 3) clockwise to you are poisoned.
flavor: If only you knew your place! But its too late now!

otherNightReminder: The Plank of Wood chooses a player. :reminder:
name: Plank of Wood - π
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Good wins if (& only if) the Storyteller is executed. If you die, keep this ability.

jinxes.reason: The Plank of Wood cannot be removed or brought into play by the Hatter's ability.
The Plank of Wood cannot be removed or brought into play by the Pit-Hag's ability. If the Pit-Hag creates a Plank of Wood, they swap characters with the previous Plank of Wood.
